creator: whavens@visteon.com
text:
Line 32 of Ant.bat

if exists "%ANT_HOME%" goto checkJava

Always fails on our systems here because %ANT_HOME% is a directory.  If you
specify a file such as "%ANT_HOME%\lib\ant.jar" the statement works correctly.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 13582 ***
creator: sbailliez@apache.org
